name: Twitter Web Round Avatar
description: Round Avatar for Twitter Web Client

style_setting_options.label: Yes ! :3
style_setting_options.value:
[src*=profile_images]:not(.DMAvatar-image) {transition: all 0.1s ease-out;transform: rotate(15deg) scale(1) skew(1deg) translate(0px);}
[src*=profile_images]:hover:not(.DMAvatar-image) {transition: all 0.5s ease-out;transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1) skew(1deg) translate(0px);}
